txt.en: Speak to Quickbeam
Orofarnë's Seed has been fertilized with the sickle mulch
Acquired sickle-fly mulch ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Quickbeam ponders what to do next. Time passes...
Fertilize Orofarnë's Seed at the Easeful Mead
'I have planted a seed in memory of my fallen friend Orofarnë. He was a guardian of the forest, tending the trees by keeping them clear of the insects. I wish to honour his memory.'
Fertilize Orofarnë's Seed at the Easeful Mead
'I need time to remember what the next step is.'
Speak to Quickbeam
Fertilize Orofarnë's Seed at the Easeful Mead

Acquire handfuls of moss ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Orofarnë's Seed has been fertilized with the Norbog-mulch
Fertilize Orofarnë's Seed at the Easeful Mead

Quickbeam has planted a seed to his fallen friend Orofarnë at the Easeful Mead. He wishes to honour the memory of his friend.
Acquire sickle-fly mulch ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Acquired Norbog-mulch ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Quickbeam ponders what to do next. Time passes...
Speak to Quickbeam
'I need time to remember what the next step is.'
'Nerbyg would often try to come and nest in the forest, but were routinely driven away.'

Quickbeam ponders what to do next. Time passes...
Return to Quickbeam
'I need time to remember what the next step is.'
Gather Neeker Stuff
'A blend of the moss and both mulches is what is needed to truly honour my friend. With that, the seed will be ready to grow on its own.'
Wait for Quickbeam
Acquired handfuls of moss from bog-lurkers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Orofarnë's Seed has been fertilized with the moss
Quickbeam has figured out what mulch is next needed for the seed.\n\nQuickbeam is ready to speak to you at Derndingle.
Return to Quickbeam
'We have honoured Orofarnë well. His seed will now grow on its own. We only have to give it time.'
Moss was once used to protect growing trees from insects.\n\nMoss can be found along the river.
Quickbeam needs to ponder how best to support the seed's growth.\n\nReturn to Quickbeam at Derndingle to hear what he has to say.
Quickbeam has figured out what mulch is next needed for the seed.\n\nQuickbeam is ready to speak to you at Derndingle.
'Sickle-flies would constantly attack the trees, keeping them from growing. With the forest disturbed, they have returned.'
Quickbeam wishes to next honour his friend by treating his seed with mulch made from Nerbyg.\n\nNerbyg can be found in the northern area of Fangorn.
Get Sicklefly
Quickbeam needs to ponder how best to support the seed's growth.\n\nReturn to Quickbeam at Derndingle to hear what he has to say.
Acquired sickle-fly mulch ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Wait for Quickbeam
Quickbeam wishes to next honour his friend by treating his seed with mulch made from sickle-flies.\n\nSickle-flies can be found in the southern area of Fangorn.
Quickbeam needs to ponder how best to support the seed's growth.\n\nReturn to Quickbeam at Derndingle to hear what he has to say.
Quickbeam has figured out what mulch is next needed for the seed.\n\nQuickbeam is ready to speak to you at Derndingle.

Quickbeam wishes to finally honour his friend by treating his seed with moss and both mulches.\n\nMoss can be found along the river. Nerbyg can be found in northern Fangorn. Sickle-flies can be found in the southern area of Fangorn.
Quickbeam is at Derndingle.
